items.sentence: Tom told Mary to tell John what she wanted to do.
Tom told Mary to tell John what she needed to do.
Tom still lives in the same neighborhood as Mary.
Tom started to sing a song and we all sang along.
Tom showed me the letter he'd received from Mary.
Tom should've dealt with that problem right away.
Tom said something to Mary and she left the room.
Tom picked up some beautiful shells on the beach.
Tom just sat there with a bored look on his face.
Tom is the speech therapist who worked with Mary.
